E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Progress of David Soto
Dear Sir,
David Soto has an AVG of .297 at A Shalomar Scythes!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/4/1987
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Pedro Manzano



Date: Thursday, 5/8/1987
Subject: Status of Donnell Wood
Dear Sir,
Donnell Wood has an AVG of .247 at AA Cordan Crows!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/22/1987
Subject: Progress of Luis Bethune
Dear Sir,
Luis Bethune is hitting the ball well at A Shalomar Scythes!
He has an AVG of .283, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/29/1987
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Todd Tabb



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1987
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Ruby Thomas



Date: Saturday, 7/19/1987
Subject: Sam Tuttle is sick...
Diagnosis: Viral Infection.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 5 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Sunday, 7/20/1987
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Warner Cannaday

Regards,
